redpanda_application_fips_mode.description: Identifies whether or not Redpanda is running in FIPS mode.

redpanda_authorization_result.description: Total number of authorization results by type

redpanda_cloud_client_backoff.description: Total number of requests that backed off

redpanda_cloud_client_client_pool_utiliz.description: Utilization of the cloud storage pool(0 - unused, 100 - fully utilized)

redpanda_cloud_client_download_backoff.description: Total number of download requests that backed off

redpanda_cloud_client_downloads.description: Total number of requests that downloaded an object from cloud storage

redpanda_cloud_client_not_found.description: Total number of requests for which the object was not found

redpanda_cloud_client_num_borrows.description: Number of time current shard had to borrow a cloud storage client from another shard

redpanda_cloud_client_upload_backoff.description: Total number of upload requests that backed off

redpanda_cloud_client_uploads.description: Total number of requests that uploaded an object to cloud storage

redpanda_cloud_storage_active_segments.description: Number of remote log segments currently hydrated for read

redpanda_cloud_storage_anomalies.description: Count of missing partition manifest anomalies for the topic

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_op_hit.description: Number of get requests for objects that are already in cache.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_op_in_progr.description: Number of files that are being put to cache.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_op_miss.description: Number of failed get requests because of missing object in the cache.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_op_put.description: Number of objects written into cache.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_space_hwm_f.description: High watermark of number of objects in cache.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_space_hwm_s.description: High watermark of sum of size of cached objects.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_space_size_.description: Sum of size of cached objects.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_space_track.description: Number of entries in cache access tracker
Number of times the access tracker was updated with cache disk data

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_trim_carryo.description: Number of times we invoked carryover trim.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_trim_exhaus.description: Number of times we couldn't free enough space with a fast trim and had to fall back to a slower exhaustive trim.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_trim_failed.description: Number of times could not free the expected amount of space, indicating possible bug or configuration issue.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_trim_fast_t.description: Number of times we have trimmed the cache using the normal (fast) mode.

redpanda_cloud_storage_cache_trim_in_mem.description: Number of times we trimmed the cache using the in-memory access tracker.

redpanda_cloud_storage_housekeeping_drai.description: Number of times upload housekeeping queue was drained

redpanda_cloud_storage_housekeeping_paus.description: Number of times upload housekeeping was paused

redpanda_cloud_storage_housekeeping_requ.description: Average rate of requests from the read and write path which were throttled by tiered storage (per shard)

redpanda_cloud_storage_housekeeping_resu.description: Number of times upload housekeeping was resumed

redpanda_cloud_storage_jobs_cloud_segmen.description: Number of segment reuploads from cloud storage sources (cloud storage cache or direct download from cloud storage)

redpanda_cloud_storage_jobs_local_segmen.description: Number of segment reuploads from local data directory

redpanda_cloud_storage_jobs_manifest_reu.description: Number of manifest reuploads performed by all housekeeping jobs

redpanda_cloud_storage_jobs_metadata_syn.description: Number of archival configuration updates performed by all housekeeping jobs

redpanda_cloud_storage_jobs_segment_dele.description: Number of segments deleted by all housekeeping jobs

redpanda_cloud_storage_limits_downloads_.description: Total amount of time downloads were throttled (ms)

redpanda_cloud_storage_partition_readers.description: Number of partition reader instances (number of current fetch/timequery requests reading from tiered storage)
How many partition reades were delayed due to hitting reader limit. This indicates cluster is saturated with tiered storage reads.

redpanda_cloud_storage_readers.description: Number of segment read cursors for hydrated remote log segments

redpanda_cloud_storage_segment_materiali.description: How many segment materializations were delayed due to hitting reader limit. This indicates cluster is saturated with tiered storage reads.

redpanda_cloud_storage_segment_readers_d.description: How many segment readers were delayed due to hitting reader limit. This indicates cluster is saturated with tiered storage reads.

redpanda_cloud_storage_spillover_manifes.description: Bytes of memory used for spilled manifests currently cached in memory
How many spilled manifests are currently cached in memory

redpanda_cluster_brokers.description: Number of configured brokers in the cluster

redpanda_cluster_controller_log_limit_re.description: Controller log rate limiting. Available rps for group
Controller log rate limiting. Amount of requests that are dropped due to exceeding limit in group

redpanda_cluster_features_enterprise_lic.description: Number of seconds remaining until the Enterprise license expires

redpanda_cluster_non_homogenous_fips_mod.description: Number of nodes that have a non-homogenous FIPS mode value

redpanda_cluster_partition_moving_from_n.description: Amount of partitions that are moving from node

redpanda_cluster_partition_moving_to_nod.description: Amount of partitions that are moving to node

redpanda_cluster_partition_node_cancelli.description: Amount of cancelling partition movements for node

redpanda_cluster_partition_num_with_brok.description: Number of partitions that don't satisfy the rack awareness constraint

redpanda_cluster_partitions.description: Number of partitions in the cluster (replicas not included)

redpanda_cluster_topics.description: Number of topics in the cluster

redpanda_cluster_unavailable_partitions.description: Number of partitions that lack quorum among replicants

redpanda_cpu_busy_seconds_total.description: Total CPU busy time in seconds

redpanda_debug_bundle_failed_generation_.description: Running count of failed debug bundle generations

redpanda_debug_bundle_last_failed_bundle.description: Timestamp of last failed debug bundle generation (seconds since epoch)

redpanda_debug_bundle_last_successful_bu.description: Timestamp of last successful debug bundle generation (seconds since epoch)

redpanda_debug_bundle_successful_generat.description: Running count of successful debug bundle generations

redpanda_io_queue_total_read_ops.description: Total read operations passed in the queue

redpanda_io_queue_total_write_ops.description: Total write operations passed in the queue

redpanda_kafka_max_offset.description: Latest readable offset of the partition (i.e. high watermark)

redpanda_kafka_partitions.description: Configured number of partitions for the topic

redpanda_kafka_quotas_client_quota_throt.description: Client quota throttling delay per rule and quota type (in seconds)

redpanda_kafka_quotas_client_quota_throu.description: Client quota throughput per rule and quota type

redpanda_kafka_replicas.description: Configured number of replicas for the topic

redpanda_kafka_request_bytes_total.description: Total number of bytes produced per topic

redpanda_kafka_request_latency_seconds.description: Internal latency of kafka produce requests

redpanda_kafka_rpc_sasl_session_expirati.description: Total number of SASL session expirations

redpanda_kafka_rpc_sasl_session_reauth_a.description: Total number of SASL reauthentication attempts

redpanda_kafka_rpc_sasl_session_revoked_.description: Total number of SASL sessions revoked

redpanda_kafka_under_replicated_replicas.description: Number of under replicated replicas (i.e. replicas that are live, but not at the latest offest)

redpanda_memory_available_memory_low_wat.description: The low-water mark for available_memory from process start

redpanda_raft_learners_gap_bytes.description: Total numbers of bytes that must be delivered to learners

redpanda_raft_recovery_offsets_pending.description: Sum of offsets that partitions on this node need to recover.

Bandwidth consumed for partition movement. bytes/sec

redpanda_raft_recovery_partitions_active.description: Number of partition replicas are currently recovering on this node.

redpanda_raft_recovery_partitions_to_rec.description: Number of partition replicas that have to recover for this node.

redpanda_rest_proxy_inflight_requests_us.description: Usage ratio of in-flight requests in the rest_proxy

redpanda_rest_proxy_queued_requests_memo.description: Number of requests queued in rest_proxy, due to memory limitations

redpanda_rpc_sent_bytes.description: internal: Number of bytes sent to clients

Total number of append entries requests in the queue

vectorized_raft_group_configuration_upda.description: Number of raft group configuration updates

vectorized_raft_lightweight_heartbeat_re.description: Number of lightweight heartbeats sent by the leader

vectorized_raft_offset_translator_incons.description: Number of append entries requests that failed the offset translator consistency check

Bandwidth available for partition movement. bytes/sec

vectorized_raft_recovery_partitions_acti.description: Number of partition replicas are currently recovering on this node.

vectorized_raft_recovery_partitions_to_r.description: Number of partition replicas that have to recover for this node.

vectorized_raft_replicate_ack_all_reques.description: Number of replicate requests with quorum ack consistency and explicit flush.
Number of replicate requests with quorum ack consistency but without an explicit flush.

vectorized_raft_replicate_ack_leader_req.description: Number of replicate requests with leader ack consistency

vectorized_raft_replicate_ack_none_reque.description: Number of replicate requests with no ack consistency

vectorized_reactor_abandoned_failed_futu.description: Total number of abandoned failed futures, futures destroyed while still containing an exception

vectorized_reactor_aio_outsizes.description: Total number of aio operations that exceed IO limit

vectorized_reactor_cpu_busy_ms.description: Total cpu busy time in milliseconds

vectorized_reactor_cpu_steal_time_ms.description: Total steal time, the time in which something else was running while the reactor was runnable (not sleeping).Because this is in userspace, some time that could be legitimally thought as steal time is not accounted as such. For example, if we are sleeping and can wake up but the kernel hasn't woken us up yet.

vectorized_reactor_cpu_used_time_ms.description: Total reactor thread CPU time (from CLOCK_THREAD_CPUTIME)

vectorized_reactor_fstream_read_bytes.description: Counts bytes read from disk file streams.  A high rate indicates high disk activity. Divide by fstream_reads to determine average read size.

vectorized_reactor_fstream_read_bytes_bl.description: Counts the number of bytes read from disk that could not be satisfied from read-ahead buffers, and had to block. Indicates short streams, or incorrect read ahead configuration.

vectorized_reactor_fstream_reads.description: Counts reads from disk file streams.  A high rate indicates high disk activity. Contrast with other fstream_read* counters to locate bottlenecks.

vectorized_reactor_fstream_reads_ahead_b.description: Counts the number of buffered bytes that were read ahead of time and were discarded because they were not needed, wasting disk bandwidth. Indicates over-eager read ahead configuration.

vectorized_reactor_fstream_reads_aheads_.description: Counts the number of times a buffer that was read ahead of time and was discarded because it was not needed, wasting disk bandwidth. Indicates over-eager read ahead configuration.

vectorized_reactor_fstream_reads_blocked.description: Counts the number of times a disk read could not be satisfied from read-ahead buffers, and had to block. Indicates short streams, or incorrect read ahead configuration.

vectorized_reactor_polls.description: Number of times pollers were executed

vectorized_reactor_stalls.description: A histogram of reactor stall durations

vectorized_reactor_tasks_pending.description: Number of pending tasks in the queue

vectorized_reactor_timers_pending.description: Number of tasks in the timer-pending queue

vectorized_rest_proxy_inflight_requests_.description: Memory usage ratio of in-flight requests in the rest_proxy
Usage ratio of in-flight requests in the rest_proxy

vectorized_rest_proxy_queued_requests_me.description: Number of requests queued in rest_proxy, due to memory limitations

vectorized_rpc_client_client_correlation.description: Number of errors in client correlation id

vectorized_rpc_client_corrupted_headers.description: Number of responses with corrupted headers

vectorized_rpc_client_out_bytes.description: Total number of bytes sent (including headers)

vectorized_rpc_client_read_dispatch_erro.description: Number of errors while dispatching responses

vectorized_rpc_client_requests_blocked_m.description: Number of requests that are blocked because of insufficient memory

vectorized_rpc_client_server_correlation.description: Number of responses with wrong correlation id

vectorized_scheduler_queue_length.description: Size of backlog on this queue, in tasks; indicates whether the queue is busy and/or contended

vectorized_scheduler_runtime_ms.description: Accumulated runtime of this task queue; an increment rate of 1000ms per second indicates full utilization

vectorized_scheduler_starvetime_ms.description: Accumulated starvation time of this task queue; an increment rate of 1000ms per second indicates the scheduler feels really bad

vectorized_scheduler_tasks_processed.description: Count of tasks executing on this queue; indicates together with runtime_ms indicates length of tasks

vectorized_scheduler_time_spent_on_task_.description: Total amount in milliseconds we were in violation of the task quota

vectorized_scheduler_waittime_ms.description: Accumulated waittime of this task queue; an increment rate of 1000ms per second indicates queue is waiting for something (e.g. IO)

vectorized_schema_registry_cache_schema_.description: The number of schemas in the store
The memory usage of schemas in the store

vectorized_schema_registry_cache_subject.description: The number of subjects in the store
The number of versions in the subject

vectorized_schema_registry_inflight_requ.description: Memory usage ratio of in-flight requests in the schema_registry
Usage ratio of in-flight requests in the schema_registry

vectorized_schema_registry_queued_reques.description: Number of requests queued in schema_registry, due to memory limitations

vectorized_security_audit_client_buffer_.description: Audit client send buffer usage ratio

vectorized_security_audit_errors_total.description: Running count of errors in creating/publishing audit event log entries

vectorized_security_audit_last_event_tim.description: Timestamp of last successful publish on the audit log (seconds since epoch)

vectorized_space_management_available_re.description: Total amount of available reclaimable data by space management.

vectorized_space_management_disk_usage_b.description: Total amount of disk usage under control of space management.

vectorized_space_management_local_retent.description: Total amount of reclaimable data above the local retention target (ref: retention.local.target.{ms,bytes}).

vectorized_space_management_reclaim_acti.description: Estimated amount of data above the active segment to be reclaimed by space management

vectorized_space_management_reclaim_esti.description: Estimated amount of data to be reclaimed by space management in last schedule.

vectorized_space_management_reclaim_loca.description: Estimated amount of data above local retention to be reclaimed by space management

vectorized_space_management_reclaim_low_.description: Estimated amount of data above the hinted low-space threshold to be reclaimed by space management
Estimated amount of data above the non-hinted low-space threshold to be reclaimed by space management

vectorized_space_management_retention_re.description: Total amount of reclaimable data through standard retention policy (ref: retention.{ms,bytes}).

vectorized_space_management_target_disk_.description: Target maximum number of stored bytes.

vectorized_space_management_target_exces.description: Amount of data usage that exceeds target threshold.

vectorized_stall_detector_reported.description: Total number of reported stalls, look in the traces for the exact reason

vectorized_storage_compaction_backlog_co.description: current controller error, i.e difference between set point and backlog size
controller output, i.e. number of shares

vectorized_storage_kvstore_cached_bytes.description: Size of the database in memory

vectorized_storage_kvstore_key_count.description: Number of keys in the database

vectorized_storage_log_bytes_prefix_trun.description: Number of bytes removed by prefix truncation.

vectorized_storage_log_cached_batches_re.description: Total number of cached batches read

vectorized_storage_log_cached_read_bytes.description: Total number of cached bytes read

vectorized_storage_log_chunked_compactio.description: Number of times chunked compaction was ran. This metric also corresponds to the number of times the compaction key-offset map was unable to be built for a single segment.

vectorized_storage_log_cleanly_compacted.description: Number of segments cleanly compacted (i.e, had their keys de-duplicated with all previous segments before them to the front of the log)

vectorized_storage_log_closed_segment_by.description: Number of bytes within closed segments of the log

vectorized_storage_log_compaction_remove.description: Number of bytes removed by a compaction operation

vectorized_storage_log_complete_sliding_.description: Number of rounds of sliding window compaction that have been driven to completion.

vectorized_storage_log_corrupted_compact.description: Number of times we had to re-construct the .compaction index on a segment

vectorized_storage_log_dirty_segment_byt.description: Number of bytes within dirty segments of the log

vectorized_storage_log_log_segments_acti.description: Current number of local log segments

vectorized_storage_log_log_segments_crea.description: Total number of local log segments created since node startup

vectorized_storage_log_log_segments_remo.description: Total number of local log segments removed since node startup

vectorized_storage_log_partition_size.description: Current size of partition in bytes

vectorized_storage_log_readers_added.description: Number of readers added to cache

vectorized_storage_log_readers_evicted.description: Number of readers evicted from cache

vectorized_storage_log_segments_marked_t.description: Number of segments that have been verified through the compaction process to be tombstone free.

vectorized_storage_log_tombstones_remove.description: Number of tombstone records removed by compaction due to the delete.retention.ms setting.

vectorized_storage_manager_housekeeping_.description: Number of logs processed by housekeeping

vectorized_tx_partition_idempotency_pid_.description: Number of active producers (known producer_id seq number pairs).
